actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a 10-year delimiting period for the pursuit of educational programs by veterans, wives, and widows.

summary.text: Provides for a ten-year delimiting period for the pursuit of educational programs by veterans and their wives, and widows under Veterans' Administration programs. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1662)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide a 10-year delimiting period for the pursuit of educational programs by veterans, wives, and widows.
